Description.Text: Hotel National is a luxurious 5-star property offering stylish accommodation in the heart of Yerevan. Highlights include a gym, indoor swimming pool, European restaurant and a 24-hour bar. Republic Square is a historic central meeting place noted for its attractive water fountains. Nearby places of interest include the National Gallery of Armenia, the Opera House and the Vernisage arts and crafts market. Hanrapetutyan Hraparak metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Yerevan destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional style mid-rise building. Facilities include a gym, indoor swimming pool, sauna and steam room. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Deluxe rooms are 30sqm and decorated in an Art Deco style with warm earth tones. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, mini-bar, air-conditioning and chargeable wired internet. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower or bathtub with integrated shower. Melange restaurant offers local and European dishes. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the 24-hour Brill bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
